name: Penguin and Squid
description:
A tragic story about hopelessness and penguins!

The penguin is hungry and needs to find food.

The squid is hungry and needs to find food.

Who will win?

There are two translations: English and Ukrainian.

(I'm not a native English speaker, so there may be mistakes)

The game lasts about 15 minutes.

Music credit: Potat0Master
